channel.title: Andrew R. Porter blog posts
channel.description: I am a remote Software Engineer at GitHub on the billing team. I enjoy writing web applications with Python and Next.js. I consider myself a lifetime learner and am currently diving into the world of Ruby.

item.title: mkdir blog && touch blog/hello_blog.md
item.description: My initial blog post to show the date that my blog was first created with some info on what you can expect to see here.

item.title: Next.js Google Analytics
item.description: Basic tutorial showing you how to utilize Google Analytics in Next.js.

item.title: Identifying potential shell aliases
item.description: Identify potential aliases by analyzing your systems command history (ZSH in this case).

item.title: Keyword Extraction in Python via RAKE
item.description: Keyword extraction in Python via RAKE (Rapid Automatic Keyword Extraction).
